verses.verse: How <S%H4100><s%> have you helped <S%H5826><s%> him that is without <S%H3808><s%> power? <S%H3581><s%> how save <S%H3467><s%> you the arm <S%H2220><s%> that has no <S%H3808><s%> strength? <S%H5797><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> have you counceled <S%H3289><s%> him that has no <S%H3808><s%> wisdom? <S%H2451><s%> and how have you plentifully <S%H7230><s%> declared <S%H3045><s%> the thing as it is?
To whom <S%H4310><s%> have you uttered <S%H5046><s%> words? <S%H4405><s%> and whose <S%H4310><s%> spirit <S%H5397><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> from you?
Dead <S%H7496><s%> things are formed <S%H2342><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H7934><s%> thereof.
Hell <S%H7585><s%> is naked <S%H6174><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> him, and destruction <S%H11><s%> has no <S%H369><s%> covering. <S%H3682><s%>
He stretches <S%H5186><s%> out the north <S%H6828><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the empty <S%H8414><s%> place, <S%H8414><s%> and hangs <S%H8518><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> on nothing. <S%H1099><s%>
He binds <S%H6887><s%> up the waters <S%H4325><s%> in his thick clouds; <S%H5645><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> is not rent <S%H1234><s%> under <S%H5921><s%> them.
He holds <S%H270><s%> back the face <S%H6440><s%> of his throne, <S%H3678><s%> and spreads <S%H6576><s%> his cloud <S%H6051><s%> on it.
He has compassed <S%H2328><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> with bounds, <S%H2706><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H216><s%> and night <S%H2822><s%> come to an end. <S%H8503><s%>
The pillars <S%H5982><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> tremble <S%H7322><s%> and are astonished <S%H8539><s%> at his reproof. <S%H1606><s%>
He divides <S%H7280><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with his power, <S%H3581><s%> and by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> he smites <S%H4272><s%> through the proud. <S%H7293><s%>
By his spirit <S%H7307><s%> he has garnished <S%H8235><s%> the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> has formed <S%H2342><s%> the crooked <S%H1281><s%> serpent. <S%H5175><s%>

See, <S%H2005><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are parts <S%H7098><s%> of his ways: <S%H1870><s%> but how <S%H4100><s%> little <S%H8102><s%> a portion <S%H1697><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> of him? but the thunder <S%H7482><s%> of his power <S%H1369><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can understand? <S%H995><s%>
